title: Iain Duncan Smith – 2003 Speech to Conservative Party Conference [Quiet Man is Here to Stay]
author: admin
summary: The speech made by Iain Duncan Smith, the then Leader of the Opposition, at the Conservative Party conference on 9 October 2003.
